name: good first issue
description: Good for newcomers.

name: greenkeeper
description: Automated dependency updater agent.

name: help wanted
description: Contributions welcome or extra attention needed.

name: priority: critical
description: Impacts human safety or livelihood.

name: priority: high
description: Affects consumer retention or product reputation.

name: priority: low
description: Implement when there are no higher priority issues.

name: priority: medium
description: Will add consumer value when released.

name: status: abandoned
description: The community has tacitly relinquished this issue.

name: status: accepted
description: The proposal has community consensus.

name: status: available
description: Voluntary contributions welcome ♥!

name: status: blocked
description: Work cannot continue until another issue is resolved.

name: status: invalid
description: This issue either contains inaccurate information, inapplicable requests, or inappropriate content.

name: status: on hold
description: Work on this has been postponed.

name: status: pending
description: Waiting for a commitment to be fulfilled.

name: status: rejected
description: This will not be worked on.

name: status: review needed
description: Needs community inspection or approval.

name: status: revision needed
description: Needs more detail before it can be considered.

name: status: triage pending
description: This issue needs a priority assignment.

name: type: breaking change
description: Modifications affect or replace the public API. ⇧ Bumps the MAJOR semver.

name: type: build
description: Changes to product build.

name: type: chore
description: Changes that don't modify source or test files.

name: type: ci
description: Continuous integration config file or script changes (e.g., travis, circle, cypress).

name: type: defect
description: A report of potentially faulty or defective product behavior.

name: type: dependency
description: Update or pin a third-party library. ⇧ Bump the PATCH semver.

name: type: docs
description: Add, edit, or delete instructional material.

name: type: feature
description: Valuable new or enhanced functionality. ⇧ Bumps the MINOR semver.

name: type: feedback
description: Answers to questions or voluntary comments/suggestions.

name: type: fix
description: Defect repairs.  ⇧ Bumps the PATCH semver.

name: type: performance
description: Changes intended to reduce latency.

name: type: question
description: Further information is requested.

name: type: refactor
description: Restructuring source code without changing its external behavior.

name: type: revert
description: Go back to specific tag or SHA1 commit.

name: type: style
description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (whitespace, formatting, etc.).

name: type: test
description: Adding, correcting, or improving tests (coverage).
